name: Deadcam
storyline: DEADCAM is a collection of short stories presented as "recordings". The player inhabits the person who recorded the footage. The first story is set inside what seems to be an abandoned Japanese high school.
summary: DEADCAM is a 80's and 90's inspired psychological survival horror game based around found footage presented as "recordings". These recordings serve as a collection of short, self-contained experiences, each set in their own location featuring unique entities, monsters and creatures.
